nycTheatreExcerpt: "Done exuberantly right, Mamma Mia! should feel like soaring karaoke meets wild revels, a whole lot of song-and-dance unreality stuffed into a real-world setting. Yet the tonecome join the raucous party, bring your shiniest bellbottoms!feels tinnier in this awkwardly mounted, haphazard jukebox show, hampered by poor sound and lackluster staging"
